name: Flappy AI (Matan Naveh)
description:
This game was made in a few hours, as a proof of concept that AI can help you make games faster and better.

  • Art: bird and the background was made by BlueWillow AI.
  • Programming: I didn't write any line of code in the game, ChatGPT did the coding and debugging
  • Music & Sounds: The sounds were made using jsfxr, and the music was created by BandLab
